smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'VmService' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
File 'extensions.kt' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
Class 'ProviderProxy' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Timetable' with '26' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'StopActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'DashActivity' with '23' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FavouriteStorage' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function notify has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function create has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onHandleIntent appears to be too complex.
The function getTripGraphs appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function warnTimetableValidity appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function getServiceDescription is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onBindViewHolder is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class Timetable is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class DashActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function createTripId is nested too deeply.
Function getTripGraphs is nested too deeply.
Function onOptionsItemSelected is nested too deeply.
Function serialize is nested too deeply.

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: EmptyClassBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: The class or object  Companion is empty.
The class or object  Companion is empty.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.
A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.
A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: ForEachOnRange
smells.description: Using the forEach method on ranges has a heavy performance cost. Prefer using simple for loops.

instances.message: Using the forEach method on ranges has a heavy performance cost. Prefer using simple for loops.

smells.name: UnsafeCast

url.openConnection() cannot be safely cast to HttpsURLConnection.

it cannot be safely cast to StopSegment.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (javaRootMapObject["success"].asJsonObject) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: javaRootMapObject["success"].asJsonObject
Parentheses in (it["departure"].asString) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it["departure"].asString
Parentheses in (seconds % 3600) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: seconds % 3600
Parentheses in (seconds % 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: seconds % 60
Parentheses in (timetable.isEmpty()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: timetable.isEmpty()
Parentheses in ((day.get(JCalendar.DAY_OF_WEEK) + 5) % 7) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (day.get(JCalendar.DAY_OF_WEEK) + 5) % 7

Parentheses in (ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.ic_timetable_departure, this.theme)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.ic_timetable_departure, this.theme)

Parentheses in (ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.ic_timetable_full, this.theme)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.ic_timetable_full, this.theme)

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class Declinator only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class NotificationChannels only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of NotificationChannels.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of Route.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FavouriteEditRowAdapter.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ServiceAdapter.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FavouritesAdapter.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of EditFavouriteActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SplashActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FavouriteStorage.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: CHANNEL_UPDATES can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private function getPlatesForStop is unused.
Private function filterDepartures is unused.
Function parameter graph is unused.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class StopSegment contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called contains
The data class StopSegment contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called remove
The data class Departure contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called copy
The data class Departure contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called timeTill

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class ID implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

instances.message: Optional braces in when expression
Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.database.sqlite.SQLiteCantOpenDatabaseException' is unused.
The import 'ml.adamsprogs.bimba.models.Timetable' is unused.
The import 'java.io.FileNotFoundException' is unused.
